name: Void of Memories - DEMO
description:
Play as MEM, a girl who woke up in a strange and unfamiliar place, without any of her memories, not knowing how she got there or what happened before.

Will you reach out the truth behind her missing memories?

- Controls:

Arrow Keys: to move MEM and navigate in menus.

Z: the "Action Key", use to jump and confim in menus. Also to execute the Action Commands during battle.

X: use to cancel or go back in menus.

ENTER: to open up the player menu outside of battles.

ESC: the pause menu, use to change between windowed mode (default) or fullscreen and also exit or restart the game.

**This is a demo is mainly to test  the main mechanics of a future project. Any feedback you may leave is greatly appreciated, as it will help a ton to improve.
